message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $9500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product valued at $10000 by you, at a discounted rate. I believe this offer will be mutually beneficial.

Alice, thanks for the offer, but I'm looking to spend no more than $10000.  Would you be willing to come down to that price?  I'm very interested in your product, and I think this price would be fair for both of us.
